title: History-sheeter booked for cheating and criminal intimidation
content:
A history-sheeter (an individual with a prior criminal record) has been officially booked.
*   The charges against them include cheating.
*   They are also accused of criminal intimidation.

title: Bhatti tears into BRS on penultimate day of electioneering
content:
Here's a summary of the headline in 3 bullet points:

*   Bhatti launched a strong and scathing attack on the BRS party.
*   The criticism occurred on the penultimate (second-to-last) day of election campaigning.
*   This signifies a significant, last-minute political offensive as elections draw to a close.

title: Hyderabad police commissioner presents awards to 1,446 personnel, introduces ‘Extra Mile’ recognition
content:
The Hyderabad police commissioner presented awards to 1,446 personnel.
*   This large-scale event recognized the contributions of a significant number of police staff.
*   A new ‘Extra Mile’ recognition program was also introduced.

title: Budget may cut reliance on foreign telescopes; trips on space spending
content:
Here's a summary of the headline in 3 bullet points:

*   The upcoming budget may introduce spending cuts.
*   One key area targeted for reduction is the country's reliance on foreign telescopes.
*   Overall expenditures on space-related programs and initiatives are also expected to be trimmed.

title: AAP leaders accuse Congress’ Bajwa of making derogatory remark against Punjab Cabinet Minister
content:
Here's a summary of the headline in 3 bullet points:

*   AAP leaders have accused Congress leader Bajwa of making a derogatory remark.
*   The alleged remark was directed against a Punjab Cabinet Minister.
*   The incident highlights a political spat between the AAP and Congress parties.

title: Rajasthani-Tamil Seva Awards presented
content:
Here's a summary of the headline in 3 bullet points:

*   The "Rajasthani-Tamil Seva Awards" were recently presented.
*   These awards recognize individuals or organizations for their dedicated 'Seva' (service).
*   The initiative aims to honor and strengthen cultural ties between the Rajasthani and Tamil communities.

title: ‘Despite challenges, T.N. met demands of govt. employees’
content:
Tamil Nadu successfully met the demands.
*   These demands were specifically from government employees.
*   The state accomplished this despite facing various challenges.

title: Police, Excise launch intensive raid in Perumbavoor; nine NDPS cases registered
content:
Here's the summary of the headline in 3 bullet points:

*   Police and Excise departments jointly launched an intensive raid.
*   The operation was conducted in Perumbavoor.
*   A total of nine NDPS (Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances) cases were registered following the raid.

title: A.P. govt. signs pact with SRM-A.P. for quantum reference facility
content:
The A.P. government has signed a pact.
*   The agreement is with SRM-A.P.
*   Its purpose is to establish a quantum reference facility.

title: Islamiah College in Tirupattur inks MOU
content:
Here's a summary of the headline in 3 bullet points:

*   Islamiah College, located in Tirupattur, is the subject of the news.
*   The college has formally signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU).
*   This MOU signifies a new agreement or collaboration for the institution.
